page.title: 12ST.FRANCIS,POSBURY CONTD.
page.content: Mother Hilary is Mother Superior of St Francis and then there are the other five sisters :Faith (the oldest at 81) Giovanna (Italian for John) Mary (a trained horticulturalist)Bride and Elizabeth.Each of the nuns has special responsibilities at St. Francis as well as housework and other duties.Mother Hilary-office work and cooking,Sister Giovanna gardening, Sister Mary gardening,Sister Bride helps with the cooking, Sister Faith helps in the kitchen preparing vegetables, Sister Elizabeth keeps all the bedrooms tidy and clean. The order was founded in 1888 by Mother Teresa.She dedicated her life to God,for over 60 years, and died in 1979. Then Mother Hilary took over.Most of the sisters that live there now came in 1945 onwards. They live in true Franciscan tradition
